Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: AddressCollection - Object for Australian Government collection submission collecting addresses of students from schools and school authorities
CensusCollection - Object for Australian Government collection submission collecting non-government school census information from schools and school authorities.
CollectionRound - Object reporting the rounds available for submission of a particular Australian Government (AG) Collection. Object is published by the Australian Government Schools hub.
CollectionStatus - Object reporting the processing status of a collection object submitted to the Australian Government. Object is published by the Australian Government collections hub.
FinancialQuestionnaireCollection - Object for Australian Government collection submission collecting financial information from schools and school authorities.

StudentAttendanceCollection - Object for Australian Government collection submission collecting Student Attendance Information. The Student Attendance Collection captures attendance information for each school location by cohort. A cohort comprises the combination of year level, gender and indigeneity. There are a maximum of six possible cohorts per year level (see Cohort attribute in table below). Data is submitted to the collection at two reporting periods (Semester 1 and Term 3). Student Attendance data is only captured for full-time students in Years 1 to 10.
LibraryPatronStatus - This object reports the current library status for the requested student or staff member.

Added for LibraryPatronStatus - LibraryTransactionListType, LibraryTransactionType, LibraryItemInfoType, CheckoutInfoType, FineInfoListType, FineInfoType, HoldInfoListType, HoldInfoType, LibraryMessageListType, LibraryMessageType
Added for all AG Collection Objects CollectionReportingListTypes
Addition to Year Level Code- 0 Year Level 0 - added for AG Collections
Addition to Relationship to Student - 14 Step-Sibling - added for NSW - school request
Additions to Attendance Codes for COVID-19 - request from VIC DET - 625 Remote learning and 214 Sent home (COVID symptoms)
